author: peachAlamode
title: Snag a Cozy Chalet Stay in the Snowy Mountains !
text: peachAlamode Posted 40 minutes ago Share Posted 40 minutes ago (edited) 𝑹𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒊𝒏 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝑵𝒆𝒘 𝒀𝒆𝒂𝒓 𝒘𝒊𝒕𝒉 𝒕𝒉𝒂𝒕 𝒔𝒑𝒆𝒄𝒊𝒂𝒍 𝒔𝒐𝒎𝒆𝒐𝒏𝒆... 𝑪𝒉𝒆𝒄𝒌-𝑰𝒏 𝒕𝒐 𝒂 𝑪𝒐𝒛𝒚 𝑪𝒉𝒂𝒍𝒆𝒕 900+ Likes on FACEBOOK! 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁 𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗙𝗮𝗰𝗲𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗣𝗮𝗴𝗲 to view MORE photos + Details Designed with a focus on Intimacy and Ultimate relaxation... 100 prims personal decor Up to 3 Person Max Occupancy Security Orb Parcel Privacy Top-Notch XXX Brand animations (bento/3-speed) Stunning snowy scenic views Lots to do throughout the entire Mountain Retreat! 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁 𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗙𝗮𝗰𝗲𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗣𝗮𝗴𝗲 to view MORE photos + Details Wᴀʀᴍ Uᴘ Bʏ ᴛʜᴇ Fɪʀᴇ - XXX Loveseat with 3 speed control adult animations - XXX Fur Rug with extensive animation menu - Crackling glowing fireplace Pʀɪᴠᴀᴛᴇ Pᴀᴛɪᴏ Wɪᴛʜ A Vɪᴇᴡ - XXX Wood-Fired Spa - XXX Romantic Dining (Fondue, Champagne, Strawberries + more) overlooking views of the mountain Bᴀᴛʜʀᴏᴏᴍ Iɴᴄʟᴜᴅᴇs - XXX Ruckus Shower Adult Jacuzzi Bath , animated sink, and toilet Kɪᴛᴄʜᴇɴ Iɴᴄʟᴜᴅᴇs - XXX Adult counters + kitchen island with cooking, cuddles + more 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁 𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗙𝗮𝗰𝗲𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗣𝗮𝗴𝗲 to view MORE photos + Details Ride the rail to visit locations throughout including... Hot Springs Spa Lodge [Adults Only] Sauna...Heated Indoor Pool... Hot Springs...Spa Soaks...Yoga... Massage...Lockers + Showers Ski Lodge with BAR, karaoke, Games + more! Horseback Riding Zip-Line Ski Lift + Snowboard + Sled rezzers Ice skating & winter fun. 𝘉𝘰𝘰𝘬 𝘢 𝘸𝘦𝘦𝘬 𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘺 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘓$2,600 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁 𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗙𝗮𝗰𝗲𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗣𝗮𝗴𝗲 to view MORE photos + Details 900+ Likes on FACEBOOK! ✈️ Visit the Chalet Lobby, for updated availability and TP to view! http://maps.secondlife.com/.../Secret%20Mirage/246/144/3519 Edited 37 minutes ago by peachAlamode Link to comment Share on other sites More sharing options...
